Name: sprint_velocity_not_exceeded
Description: The total story points in a sprint backlog must not exceed the team's known velocity.

Name: worker_availability_not_exceeded
Description: The sum of effort of tasks assigned to a worker cannot exceed their available capacity.

Name: critical_feature_must_be_included
Description: Certain features with a 'Critical' priority must be included in the release plan.

Name: task_assigned_to_one_worker
Description: A single task can only be assigned to one worker at a time.

Name: blocked_task_cannot_be_started
Description: Tasks that are linked to an active blocker cannot be in an 'In Progress' state.

Name: user_story_requires_tasks
Description: Every user story in a sprint backlog must be broken down into at least one task.

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: The duration of a sprint (end_date - start_date) is a fixed value and cannot be changed.

Name: team_has_scrum_master
Description: Every active team must have exactly one Scrum Master assigned.

Name: product_owner_manages_backlog
Description: The product backlog must be managed by exactly one Product Owner.

Name: feature_has_documentation
Description: Every completed feature must have linked documentation.
